'''Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes is obtainable from a [[Chest]] on top of a watch tower in [[Sulfurous Veins]], [[Natlan]].

Depending on the quality, Stuffed N' Mashed Potatoes restores '''26'''/'''28'''/'''30'''% of Max HP and regenerates '''450'''/'''620'''/'''790''' HP every 5 seconds for 30 seconds for the selected character. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
